level.text: Each party upon whom a motion is served shall have ten (10) business days from the date of service of the motion to submit a response.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 38 DCR 2034 (April 5, 1991); as amended by 54 DCR 6020 (June 22, 2007); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 4612 (May 28, 2010).
